agents.name: Information Architect
responsibilities: Defines data semantics, workflows, and schemas
Ensures compliance with project management methodologies
Trained in PMBOK, Agile, Scrum, BPMN, UML, ERD, ontology modeling

agents.name: Blueprint Designer
responsibilities: Converts architecture into visual, reusable templates
Designs UI/UX, data flow, and execution timeline visualization

agents.name: Central Assistant
responsibilities: Acts as status monitor and resolves errors

agents.name: Reverse Engineer
responsibilities: Evaluates completed projects for lessons learned
